name: matchDomainOnly
label: Match domain only
description: When matching rules to a URL, only use the domain as criteria

name: keepOldTabs
label: Keep old tabs
description: After a contained tab has been created, the old won't be closed

name: openInCurrentContainer
label: Open in current container
description: A list of domains separated by a pipe (|) which will *always* open in the current container that opened them

name: defaultContainer
label: Default container
description: Which container unmatched URLs will end up in

preferences.name: containerName
preferences.label: Container name
preferences.description: What the name of the default container will be. It's possible to use variables here

preferences.name: lifetime
preferences.label: Lifetime
preferences.description: How long a container will live

choices.name: forever
choices.label: Forever
choices.description: Container will always be present after creation

choices.name: untilLastTab
choices.label: Until last tab is closed
choices.description: Closing the last tab in the container will destroy the container

preferences.name: ruleAddition
preferences.label: Rule addition
preferences.description: The rule to be added to this container once a domain is matched (can be empty)
